text: one part of course is like okay we're
gonna get alexa into the picture and so
now we have voice control of the home
it's kind of like the great enabler the
great simplifier you can just say you
know alexa
turn off my light and she'll turn off
the lights very very simple type of
interaction but the other sort of piece
of that that we think about a lot is
what we call kind of an actually smart
home which is it's it's not just
sort of a fancy remote control for your
home it's not just sort of like i push
this button and then that automation
happens
it's having a home you know with this
intelligent assistant alexa that can
really do things on your behalf things
that are really valuable to you
help you achieve high level goals like
living more sustainably
or you know just being more comfortable
or keeping your family safe
